stepTitle: Suppose you have a coffee mug with a circular cross section and vertical sides (uniform radius). What is its inside radius if it holds $$375$$ g of coffee when filled to a depth of $$7.50$$ cm? Assume coffee has the same density as water.
stepBody: What is its inside radius if it holds $$375$$ g of coffee when filled to a depth of $$7.50$$ cm? Assume coffee has the same density as water.
